original_title: Two school students killed in accident close to Badulla grounds; six others injured
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Two school students have died in a motor accident in close proximity to the Badulla Cricket Ground. Six others have also sustained injuries, according to the Sri Lanka Police.
Two school students killed in accident close to Badulla grounds; six others injured
